feature.label: Woodpile
feature.description: Woodpile is an Eclipse plugin for capturing and viewing Apache Log4j events. Inspired by Chainsaw. Intended for developers. Requires Eclipse 3.2 and JDK 1.5 runtime. Compatible with Log4j 1.2.13. Uses Beanshell 2.0b4.
